TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Xincheng, title = Xincheng, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xincheng} }

S.FORM: sincen sincen guan (tinurukuan: alang paru；'inamizukuan: sudadatan；pinairangan: sin-siânn-hiong；nginaingayngan: sinˋ shang hiongˋ), sicuayan izua drusa ngadan timadju tauta duluman kata daluwan. i maza i pasaviri tua taiwan a kalingu king, a i viri kata keledep nakidjekec tua siulin, a i tjaikacedas na kicevung tua taipingyan, a i navalj kicaing ta milun pana dideq kata hualien hici. a sikici 29.4095 km², na ljaqedi ta hulien hici avan ta tjaljakedrian a qinaljan i kalinguking. aicu guan sangasangasan a siljitaladje ta kalingu, aza kinaizuanan a kadjunangan a kicain ta gadu sa i ljaving ta ljavek, saka izua ngadan "sincen kasintan" aya qivu. aza ljaviljaving a paka ljavek a djalan kemasi navalj i cisintan sema viri mata yueyawan a pacunan ta ljavek. izua liaw talem a racev kata kakudanan, mirazek ta sengsengan a qacilay kata inalang a qaciljay. saka taqinaljan kidjalu tu salenguwaq, izua masa ljivavaw mirazek a kivangavangan. ljadut ta hualien hici, mamaw kata djian guan mirazerazek a hici, aicu penuljat ta hici a caucau kimaya djemaljum drusa puluq kudraw. au a i kalinguking tjaljaqacavan a vavelian a siubay "carrefour", "hola", imaza a king. kadjunangan a kadjunangan i sincen guan sedjlj lizulizu, avan angata 97% pakata penuljat a kadjunangan a guan. a kinalangan nua kadjunangan ladruq saka lusepitj, maka ljaviljaving kemasi viri patje navalj tu 16 km, a kemasi kacedas patje keledep tjalja melavan kimaya 5 km. izua milun pana, sanzan pana kata shumici pana cemalivat semamaza. au pakata sengsengan, ngiu, kiciqaw, izuanan semaqaciljay miraezk tauta. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak i sincen guan, izua alu qinaljan, sinecen, senan, kangle, dahan, beipu, djalin, djali kata djasin. a penuljat a guan izua sincen kata beipu, aicu drusa qinaljan piniliq pasaviri a sincen kata pasanavalj a sincen. aicu drusa a qinaljan avan za sanzan pana a dideq. aza kinacadjan tu 12 km. aicu pasaviri a sincen matjadrusa mula izua sincen kata senan, na kicaing ta tairuku nua kuka kakivangvangan kata suhua kunglu. izua gaku na kutjung a siulin, gaku na kukumin a sincen, disiaba i sincen, biu i sincen, sincen a kakivangvangan, sincen a sicuayan a hici. sinipapungadan a nanemanga i maza i pasaviri a sincen, ljakua aicu imaza a caucau amin tu drusa kuzulj sa lima taiday. kimaya 1/8 pakata penuljat a guan. au izua unem a qinaljan, beipu, djali, dahan, kangle, djasin kata djalin, kimaya aza penuljat a caucau pakata sincen guan imaza. a kinaljcadjan izua tu 3 km kata hualien hici, izua disiba i beipu, sincen a gukusiu kata venecikan na takakudan a umaq, na nugiu cacukingan, iubingkiyuku, kakipucemelan a kalingu nua sivitai a kuga, cisintan, kalingu hikugiu, tjasan hikugiu na sivitai, dahan daigaku, kuzing haysin kaucung a gaku, gaku na kutjung a sincen, na sihu a papudingkingki kata vavelian a siubay "carrefour", a tjalja papazangal a kikang imaza linindjelj. kalevelevan a kalevelevan semezan tu kemaledeledev, a ta caviljan a sezaman 22.5°C, au a sikudjaljan avan 2264 mm, nasuzusi a igininkan a kalevelevan. cinalivatan aicu sincen guan ka sicuayan pakata turukuzuku a qivu "daluwan", saka pairang a qivu "duluman" kata "dawkeman". ka cinting a djiday, ti wuchuan kacuing a nugiw semamaza a qemuma, lja turukuzuku puliaw a kiqeci malap tua quluqulu, au cukulu ta ripa sikiqecen ta turukuzuku, avan nu sikipu ngadan ta "sincen"(imi atalasi a hici)" . ulja aza izua kacalisian mangetjez a kilivu avanzua kitjukuda vaik a pasanavalj. ka 1875 a cavilj, ti kamakama a ludacun kacuing a sivitai semandjalan kemasi suaw mata kalingu, au sinivarung imaza masan ta sangasangasan a guan siljitaladje ta kalingu, saka izua ngadan "sincen " aya qivu. ka 1896 a cavilj, lja yiwe makilu ta ripun a maqaqeci avan zua qavan nua ripun semamaza. ka 1914 a cavilj, aza ripun kamakama zudjudjian zumatay kacuing a sivitai vaik a kiqeci djemadjas tu turukuzuku, ka maka semanguaq lemingdjelj ta kalingukangting a sincen citing , aza ripun sihu ulja mapuala ta sinikakudan ti kamakama zudjudjian, saka ka 1920 a cavilj, cemekaulj aza ngadan ta "yenhay" timadju, sincen citing pavalitan ta "yenhay citing" , a sini varung lemindjelj pinyei ci. ka 1937 a cavilj, aicu pakata kalingukangting a pavalitan a sirasudjan, cucansu pavalitan tua citing. sualapen yenhay citing, saka pinyei ci pavalitan ta "yenhay zuang", kanri pakata kalingukangting a kalingudjin. au kapuamin a maqaqeci avan nanan za kinipungadan, kanri ta kacalisian a kadjunangan nasekalingudjin, linindjelj ta yenhay guan imaza, saka ka 1946 a cavilj, pavalian ta "sincen" aicu a ngadan, "sincen guan" aya, au ulja ceviqen a kacalisian a kadjunangan, linindjelj ta siulin guan patje tucu. guciu paljavak tua kadjunangan matja 8 qinaljan i sincen. matja 12 qinaljan imaza, pacidal , paudadan , lalumaang , palamitan , kaliyawan , cilapuk , sudadatan , pibutingan , hupu , katanka , pabuisan , palinkaan . caucau a sincen guan masansimatjelj a caucau i kainlinguking, au masansitjelulj a mavalidan pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak. saka aicu a mavalidan tjaljavavaw ta na kuka a papamaw. tucu 15 a caviljan, aza caucau itua 20000-21000, ka 2019 a cavilj lima qiljas mamaw kata 2011 a cavilj a cuaucau. ika na miralua a tjuruvuan ta caucau. avan nu masan maljian na hici a mirazek i taiwan. ljakua tucu a kinsihu i beipu mula semanumaq tu 651 paljingan a ljavavavavan izua tu pitju a sinan na maqacuvucuvung a kakaizuanan, a sinan tjaljatekuan avan za siubay, au kinsihu a kisang djemaulj ta uli sa siubuy a sengesengan. lja aicu a kadjunangan ljadut ta hualien hici, izua qacaqaca a siuby linindjelj imaza, nu tjaivilianga qatjaw masan tua i kalingu a tjaljat djaljavan a mirazek a kadjunangan. nasidjaravacan sinupuan hasisiw i kalingu sincen a hasisiw gimeng a beipu gimeng a djali gimeng a djamin gimeng a djawan kakipucemelan kakipucemelan a kalingu nua sivitai a kuga sincen isisiu kinsic nugiu izua talem a racev, katawa, puday, ljaceng, paday kata vurasi. izua mapulju na temalem ta suyka, rigayan a qudis, veljevelj kata kamurav. pakata ziriu a kinisan nua kingsihu, aza i sincen guan a dikilu qumaing a kadjunangan 943.87 marutarauljan. tucuan cavilj lja tja sanpazangalem a nugiu sengsengan kata kaizuangata kakivanvanngan tu mirazek, aza nugiu patagilj a papirazek ta i qinaljan a maljian a racev sipaveli pasa gaikuk, paruza katawa, vasa, vurasi, zinaung qaljeceqec a ljaceng kata lukuc. a pakata kiciqaw, izua paka pana puciqavan kata pakaljaving ta ljavek. makapana a ciqaw izua liaw a maljetimalj a kanaciqavan, saka izua kisan cukuluing tua malji a na ciqaw a racev a kuba. pakata pana puciqavan, liaw a ukui amareka ciqaw, hama kata quzang. kuba sincen guan a sengsengan avan za malanglang ta qaciljay, izua mareka maljimalji a kana qaciljaciljaing, izua zaqtja. au penuljat drusa pulua sa tjelu a kuba, nu ita cavilj a inalangan izua tu lima puluq sa sepatj a laulavan. siubay kivangavangan aicu ziriu pakata caucau semamaza i cisintan racev

sincen sincen goan (tinorokoan: alang paro；'inamizokoan: sodadatan；pinairangan: sin-siânn-hiong；nginaingayngan: sinˋ shang hiongˋ), sicoayan izoa drosa ngadan timadjo taota doloman kata dalowan. i maza i pasaviri toa taiwan a kalingo king, a i viri kata keledep nakidjekec toa siolin, a i tjaikacedas na kicevong toa taipingyan, a i navalj kicaing ta milon pana dideq kata hoalien hici. a sikici 29.4095 km², na ljaqedi ta holien hici avan ta tjaljakedrian a qinaljan i kalingoking. aico goan sangasangasan a siljitaladje ta kalingo, aza kinaizoanan a kadjonangan a kicain ta gado sa i ljaving ta ljavek, saka izoa ngadan "sincen kasintan" aya qivo. aza ljaviljaving a paka ljavek a djalan kemasi navalj i cisintan sema viri mata yoeyawan a paconan ta ljavek. izoa liaw talem a racev kata kakodanan, mirazek ta sengsengan a qacilay kata inalang a qaciljay. saka taqinaljan kidjalo to salengowaq, izoa masa ljivavaw mirazek a kivangavangan. ljadot ta hoalien hici, mamaw kata djian goan mirazerazek a hici, aico penoljat ta hici a caocao kimaya djemaljom drosa poloq kodraw. ao a i kalingoking tjaljaqacavan a vavelian a siobay "carrefoor", "hola", imaza a king. kadjonangan a kadjonangan i sincen goan sedjlj lizolizo, avan angata 97% pakata penoljat a kadjonangan a goan. a kinalangan noa kadjonangan ladroq saka losepitj, maka ljaviljaving kemasi viri patje navalj to 16 km, a kemasi kacedas patje keledep tjalja melavan kimaya 5 km. izoa milon pana, sanzan pana kata shomici pana cemalivat semamaza. ao pakata sengsengan, ngio, kiciqaw, izoanan semaqaciljay miraezk taota. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak i sincen goan, izoa alo qinaljan, sinecen, senan, kangle, dahan, beipo, djalin, djali kata djasin. a penoljat a goan izoa sincen kata beipo, aico drosa qinaljan piniliq pasaviri a sincen kata pasanavalj a sincen. aico drosa a qinaljan avan za sanzan pana a dideq. aza kinacadjan to 12 km. aico pasaviri a sincen matjadrosa mola izoa sincen kata senan, na kicaing ta tairoko noa koka kakivangvangan kata sohoa konglo. izoa gako na kotjong a siolin, gako na kokomin a sincen, disiaba i sincen, bio i sincen, sincen a kakivangvangan, sincen a sicoayan a hici. sinipapongadan a nanemanga i maza i pasaviri a sincen, ljakoa aico imaza a caocao amin to drosa kozolj sa lima taiday. kimaya 1/8 pakata penoljat a goan. ao izoa onem a qinaljan, beipo, djali, dahan, kangle, djasin kata djalin, kimaya aza penoljat a caocao pakata sincen goan imaza. a kinaljcadjan izoa to 3 km kata hoalien hici, izoa disiba i beipo, sincen a gokosio kata venecikan na takakodan a omaq, na nogio cacokingan, iobingkiyoko, kakipocemelan a kalingo noa sivitai a koga, cisintan, kalingo hikogio, tjasan hikogio na sivitai, dahan daigako, kozing haysin kaocong a gako, gako na kotjong a sincen, na siho a papodingkingki kata vavelian a siobay "carrefoor", a tjalja papazangal a kikang imaza linindjelj. kalevelevan a kalevelevan semezan to kemaledeledev, a ta caviljan a sezaman 22.5°C, ao a sikodjaljan avan 2264 mm, nasozosi a igininkan a kalevelevan. cinalivatan aico sincen goan ka sicoayan pakata torokozoko a qivo "dalowan", saka pairang a qivo "doloman" kata "dawkeman". ka cinting a djiday, ti wochoan kacoing a nogiw semamaza a qemoma, lja torokozoko poliaw a kiqeci malap toa qoloqolo, ao cokolo ta ripa sikiqecen ta torokozoko, avan no sikipo ngadan ta "sincen"(imi atalasi a hici)" . olja aza izoa kacalisian mangetjez a kilivo avanzoa kitjokoda vaik a pasanavalj. ka 1875 a cavilj, ti kamakama a lodacon kacoing a sivitai semandjalan kemasi soaw mata kalingo, ao sinivarong imaza masan ta sangasangasan a goan siljitaladje ta kalingo, saka izoa ngadan "sincen " aya qivo. ka 1896 a cavilj, lja yiwe makilo ta ripon a maqaqeci avan zoa qavan noa ripon semamaza. ka 1914 a cavilj, aza ripon kamakama zodjodjian zomatay kacoing a sivitai vaik a kiqeci djemadjas to torokozoko, ka maka semangoaq lemingdjelj ta kalingokangting a sincen citing , aza ripon siho olja mapoala ta sinikakodan ti kamakama zodjodjian, saka ka 1920 a cavilj, cemekaolj aza ngadan ta "yenhay" timadjo, sincen citing pavalitan ta "yenhay citing" , a sini varong lemindjelj pinyei ci. ka 1937 a cavilj, aico pakata kalingokangting a pavalitan a sirasodjan, cocanso pavalitan toa citing. soalapen yenhay citing, saka pinyei ci pavalitan ta "yenhay zoang", kanri pakata kalingokangting a kalingodjin. ao kapoamin a maqaqeci avan nanan za kinipongadan, kanri ta kacalisian a kadjonangan nasekalingodjin, linindjelj ta yenhay goan imaza, saka ka 1946 a cavilj, pavalian ta "sincen" aico a ngadan, "sincen goan" aya, ao olja ceviqen a kacalisian a kadjonangan, linindjelj ta siolin goan patje toco. gocio paljavak toa kadjonangan matja 8 qinaljan i sincen. matja 12 qinaljan imaza, pacidal , paodadan , lalomaang , palamitan , kaliyawan , cilapok , sodadatan , pibotingan , hopo , katanka , paboisan , palinkaan . caocao a sincen goan masansimatjelj a caocao i kainlingoking, ao masansitjelolj a mavalidan pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak. saka aico a mavalidan tjaljavavaw ta na koka a papamaw. toco 15 a caviljan, aza caocao itoa 20000-21000, ka 2019 a cavilj lima qiljas mamaw kata 2011 a cavilj a coaocao. ika na miraloa a tjorovoan ta caocao. avan no masan maljian na hici a mirazek i taiwan. ljakoa toco a kinsiho i beipo mola semanomaq to 651 paljingan a ljavavavavan izoa to pitjo a sinan na maqacovocovong a kakaizoanan, a sinan tjaljatekoan avan za siobay, ao kinsiho a kisang djemaolj ta oli sa sioboy a sengesengan. lja aico a kadjonangan ljadot ta hoalien hici, izoa qacaqaca a sioby linindjelj imaza, no tjaivilianga qatjaw masan toa i kalingo a tjaljat djaljavan a mirazek a kadjonangan. nasidjaravacan sinopoan hasisiw i kalingo sincen a hasisiw gimeng a beipo gimeng a djali gimeng a djamin gimeng a djawan kakipocemelan kakipocemelan a kalingo noa sivitai a koga sincen isisio kinsic nogio izoa talem a racev, katawa, poday, ljaceng, paday kata vorasi. izoa mapoljo na temalem ta soyka, rigayan a qodis, veljevelj kata kamorav. pakata zirio a kinisan noa kingsiho, aza i sincen goan a dikilo qomaing a kadjonangan 943.87 marotaraoljan. tocoan cavilj lja tja sanpazangalem a nogio sengsengan kata kaizoangata kakivanvanngan to mirazek, aza nogio patagilj a papirazek ta i qinaljan a maljian a racev sipaveli pasa gaikok, paroza katawa, vasa, vorasi, zinaong qaljeceqec a ljaceng kata lokoc. a pakata kiciqaw, izoa paka pana pociqavan kata pakaljaving ta ljavek. makapana a ciqaw izoa liaw a maljetimalj a kanaciqavan, saka izoa kisan cokoloing toa malji a na ciqaw a racev a koba. pakata pana pociqavan, liaw a okoi amareka ciqaw, hama kata qozang. koba sincen goan a sengsengan avan za malanglang ta qaciljay, izoa mareka maljimalji a kana qaciljaciljaing, izoa zaqtja. ao penoljat drosa poloa sa tjelo a koba, no ita cavilj a inalangan izoa to lima poloq sa sepatj a laolavan. siobay kivangavangan aico zirio pakata caocao semamaza i cisintan racev
